subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Detroit’s Johan Franzen’s scored his sixth game-winner of the month, passing the previous franchise record, held by the Hall of Famer Gordie Howe and his current teammate Henrik Zetterberg.
snippet: Detroit’s Johan Franzen’s scored his sixth game-winner of the month, passing the previous franchise record, held by the Hall of Famer Gordie Howe and his current teammate Henrik Zetterberg.
